channel.title: Wild West FM - Day 5 - Mafia Win!
channel.description:
# Welcome to the Wild West ![image|690x388](upload://akfNO3lJSB5ldYCd1spJVUiPmnX.jpeg) # Wild West FM - Hosted by The Texans (@Marshal and @Italy) <small><small>(and now also @CRichard564, alongside with @Insanity as VC slave)</small></small>
## Rolelist **[color=green]19x Town Cowboy (Vanilla Townie)[/color]** **[color=red]6x Mafia Bandit (Mafia Goon)[/color]**
## Game Details - This game is mountainous. That means that everybody is vanilla and has no abilities - The player with the most votes at the end of the day will be hanged - Hangings will be plurality and Majority. Upon tied votes, a random player (including no-hang) tied for the most votes will die. - Starting Day 2, each player will be able to take 1 ITA shot each day any time besides the first and last hour of the day. These ITAs will have a 18% chance of hitting. To use an ita, do **/shoot [player]** and ping the hosts - ITAs will be disabled when 8 players are alive, or when the game is in LyLo. - Game phases are 36/12 - The town win when all Mafia are defeated. The Mafia win when they gain parity. - Mafia have an optional factional kill that is mandatory if a no-hang was decided the previous day. - Mafia members can communicate at all times and will do so through a separate forum topic or discord server. - Players must make at least 20 game-related posts per day phase, unless it ends early due to majority. If they fail to meet that requirement they will be force-replaced during the night.
#### Example Rolecards can be seen below. [details=Example Rolecards] ># [color=green] Town Cowboy [/color] > Your only abilities are your vote, your voice, and your trusty gun. > > *Rid the town of all bandits*
># [color=Red] Mafia Bandit [/color] > Your only abilities are your vote, your voice, and your trusty gun. > > *Gain parity with the town*
[/details]
## Playerlist 1. Centuries 1. ~~Clonedcheese~~ **ITA'd Day 2 - [color=green] Town Cowboy[/color]** 1. ash4fun 1. ~~Trochilidae~~ **Dead Night 3 - [color=green] Town Cowboy[/color]** 1. ~~Leafia~~ **ITA'd Day 2 - [color=green] Town Cowboy[/color]** 1. ~~Mist1422~~ **ITA'd Day 2 - [color=green] Town Cowboy[/color]** 1. an_gorta_pratai 1. ~~Intensify~~ **Hanged Day 2 - [color=green]Town Cowboy[/color]** 1. ~~Surge~~ **Hanged Day 1 - [color=red]Mafia Bandit[/color]** 1. ~~PokemonKidRyan~~ **ITA'd Day 2 - [color=green] Town Cowboy[/color]** 1. ~~RangerCecil~~ **Dead Night 1 - [color=green] Town Cowboy[/color]** 1. Light 1. Wazza 1. ~~Luxy~~ **Dead Night 2 - [color=green] Town Cowboy[/color]** 1. Universal 1. ~~yee-claw~~ **ITA'd Day 2 - [color=green] Town Cowboy[/color]** 1. ~~Thunal33~~ **ITA'd Day 3 - [color=green] Town Cowboy[/color]** 1. Vulgard 1. Sulit 1. ~~Moleland~~ **ITA'd Day 2 - [color=red] Mafia Bandit[/color]** 1. Whysper 1. ~~brainpower~~ ~~Geyde~~ eevee 1. ~~deadbananas0~~ **ITA'd Day 2 - [color=green] Town Cowboy[/color]** 1. Appelsiini 1. ~~Apprentice~~ **Hanged Day 3 - [color=green]Town Cowboy[/color]**
## Backups 1. Chloe 1. TheBlueElixir 1.
## Spectators (will be uninformed, may request to be informed after gamestart) 1. PsychoKang 1. Katze 1. astand 1. Napoleon 1. Jane 1.
# Thread Milestones.
[End of Day 1](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/wild-west-fm-day-1-25-25/83518/3010?u=marshal) [Start of D2 ITAs](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/wild-west-fm-day-2-23-25/83518/3305?u=marshal) - [Luxy ITA's Leafia : Hit](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/wild-west-fm-day-2-23-25/83518/3327?u=marshal) - [yee-claw ITA's Deadbananas0 : Hit](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/wild-west-fm-day-2-23-25/83518/3454?u=marshal) - [Appelsiini ITA's clonedcheese: Hit](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/wild-west-fm-day-2-21-25/83518/3482?u=marshal) - [PokemonKidRyan ITA's Mist1422: Hit](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/wild-west-fm-day-2-20-25/83518/3974?u=marshal) - [Centuries ITA's Moleland: Hit](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/wild-west-fm-day-2-19-25/83518/4095?u=marshal) - [an_gorta+pratai ITA's yee-claw: Hit](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/wild-west-fm-day-2-18-25/83518/4233?u=marshal) - [Whysper ITA's PokemonKidRyan: Hit](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/wild-west-fm-day-2-17-25/83518/4420?u=marshal)
[End of Day 2](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/wild-west-fm-day-2-16-25/83518/5455?u=marshal) [Start of D3 ITAs](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/wild-west-fm-day-3-14-25/83518/5526?u=marshal) - [Vulgard ITA's Thunal33: Hit](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/wild-west-fm-day-3-14-25/83518/5635?u=marshal)
[End of Day 3](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/wild-west-fm-day-3-13-25/83518/6162?u=marshal)

item.title: Wild West FM - Day 5 - Mafia Win!
item.dc:creator: Appelsiini
item.description:
Your case on Ash was well done, even if the conclusion was incorrect. It’s clear you were putting in effort, which I commented on when the game was ongoing. I’d say

  • Alice
  • Mist
  • Gorta
  • Vulgard

All deserve a headpat for their good job.

Read full topic

item.source: Wild West FM - Day 5 - Mafia Win!

item.title: Wild West FM - Day 5 - Mafia Win!
item.dc:creator: an_gorta_pratai
item.description:
Well, I did lead to a townie, but I was one of the few people pushing for us to not just snap shoot/snap vote and to re-eval the game, even if my own read and push was terrible. I suppose I did correctly scum read Centuries at one point and caught the most likely deep wolf when most others didn’t, so I consider that a victory in my eyes. I just wish people would have listened to me about Centuries openwolfing and Centuries bussing, especially since I WAS WOLF WITH HIM IN TOS2, so I should know how scum Centuries plays

Read full topic
item.source: Wild West FM - Day 5 - Mafia Win!
